title: So yeah high fps . low ping. Still lag
body:
So I have a pretty damn good computer. All drivers are updated, graphics etc.
I have an FPS rate of around 249 most of the time and an MS of 42.
Once I get near somebody I will do one of the following
1.Lag for a moment.
2.Reconnect pops up.
3. Lag for a long time, then disconnect.
I use Xfinity and its a pretty nice internet speed with full bars of wifi.
So any ideas at all

replies.body: It sounds that even though your internet is solid, something is causing you to lose connection entirely from the game server.  You can still run into issue reaching specific services, so I suggest going over each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Testing out in a custom game mode would be a safe place to troubleshoot this!  Let me know if you have any questions.
